description: If you're new to snowshoeing, this guide can help you make tracks on easy snowshoe trips in the Canadian Rockies. The more than 75 routes extend from scenic Waterton in the south to the Columbia Icefield in the north section of Banff National Park. Colour photos, maps, and detailed descriptions are provided for each trip, and many of the routes are suitable for families.
name: Beginner's Guide Snowshoeing Canadian Rockies 2Ed.
